name: Html.Parser

unions.name: Node
unions.comment:
An HTML node. It can either be:

  - Text
  - Element (with its **tag name**, **attributes** and **children**)
  - Comment

values.name: run
values.comment:
Run the parser! run "

Hello, world!

" -- => Ok [ Element "div" [] [ Element "p" [] [ Text "Hello, world!" ] ] ]

name: Html.Parser.Util

values.name: toVirtualDom
values.comment: Converts nodes to virtual dom nodes.

values.name: toVirtualDomSvg
values.comment:
Converts nodes to virtual dom SVG nodes.

Note: If node list contains `<svg>` tag, you can use `toVirtualDom` instead.
Otherwise, use this function.

    svg : Svg msg
    svg =
        parse """<circle cx="40" cy="40" r="24" style="stroke:#006600; fill:#00cc00"/>"""
            |> toVirtualDomSvg
            |> Svg.svg []
